title: 6.4 The Heapsort Algorithm
content:
Section 6.4

The Heapsort Algorithm

Summary

Sort by building a heap, then repeatedly extracting the maximum.

Key Points

  • Build max-heap from input array
  • Swap root (max) with last element
  • Reduce heap size, heapify the root
  • Repeat until sorted
  • Time: O(n log n), Space: O(1)

Pseudocode

HEAPSORT(A):
    BUILD-MAX-HEAP(A)
    for i = n downto 2:
        swap A[1] and A[i]
        heap-size = heap-size - 1
        MAX-HEAPIFY(A, 1)

Why It Matters

In-place O(n log n) sorting with guaranteed worst-case performance.
